testcase.name: Add Coupons
testcase.system-out: Given User navigated to the Login page......................................passed And Enter Username "admin" and password "Admin@123".........................passed Then User should be able to login...........................................passed When Click on side menu button..............................................passed And click on the coupons button.............................................passed Then User should be able to navigate to Coupons page........................passed Given User is in the Coupons page and click on Add Coupon button............passed When Add Coupon details and click save......................................passed And Verify the added Coupon.................................................passed And Click Edit the added Coupon.............................................passed And Verify the Edited coupon in coupon list.................................passed And Delete the coupon.......................................................passed Then Couple should get deleted..............................................passed
